Hi James,

The board game is Hex and I like to play human vs evolved player just to
see how well its doing , now that you mentioned evolved vs another
evolved player  would be so so helpful. My tactics is for them to learn
from each other so they will learn different strategies as oppose to
playing against myself and only learn one kind of strategy. Maybe sounds
a bit strange but i think i'll get a better results this way. Just have
to wait and see

Ramin 

>>> djames@... 03/21/06 10:41 PM >>>
Hi Ramin,

Just to clarify...which board game is this?

Do you want to play human vs. evolved player?  Or evolved player vs.
some
other AI?

Derek

On 3/21/06, Ramin Lessani <kcy42rl@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
>
> I have used NEAT to build a board player. Now after thousands of
> generations I have a champion chromosom but I don't know how to use
that
> champion in ANJI so one can play against it to see is she a real
> champion or not. If anyone can direct me how to use my champion and
play
